translations: adj.有翼状物的（常用于植物之茎或果实）；有翼的

phrs.translation: 有翼的, 有翼状物的, 有翅的, 翼侧的
有翅胎生雌虫, 有翅胎生蚜

sentences.sentence: Olfactory responses ofR. wadi apteral to wheat plant volatiles were higher than alate.
sentences.translation: 禾谷缢管蚜无翅蚜对小麦挥发物的嗅觉反应多强于有翅蚜。

sentences.sentence: There was a close genetic relationship between the fundatrix (apterous), virginoparae (apterous) and virginoparae (alate) in the green peach aphid.
sentences.translation: 干母、干雌和迁移蚜之间的遗传关系最近。

sentences.sentence: During the tobacco hardening period bed of tobacco seedling was the falling target of alate aphids and was the main resource of tobacco virus spread by aphids.
sentences.translation: 炼苗期烟草苗床是传毒介体有翅蚜着落的靶子中心，是烟田蚜传病毒病的主要初侵染源，为防治烟草蚜传病毒病的关键时期。
